013package org.apache.juneau.swaps;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.regex.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
021
022/**
023 * Transforms {@link MatchResult MatchResults} to {@code List} objects.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * Entries in the list represent matched groups in a regular expression.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
029 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#jm.Swaps">Swaps</a>
030
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class MatchResultSwap extends ObjectSwap<MatchResult,List<String>> {
034
035   /**
036    * Converts the specified {@link Enumeration} to a {@link List}.
037    */
038   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
039   public List<String> swap(BeanSession session, MatchResult o) {
040      List<String> l = Utils.listOfSize(o.groupCount());
041      for (int i = 0; i <= o.groupCount(); i++)
042         l.add(o.group(i));
043      return l;
044   }
045}
